turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Task 1: Visiting a Medical Clinic and Booking or Changing an Appointment

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Hello, this is Green Valley Medical Clinic. How can I help you today—are you calling to make, change, or cancel an appointment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Good morning.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Good morning! How can I assist you today? Are you looking to schedule a new appointment or adjust an existing one?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, let’s get

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'd like to make an appointment to see my doctor, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course. May I have your name and the reason for your visit, please?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “My name is Rui Hashimoto, R-U-I H-A-S-H-I-M-O-T-O.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you, Rui Hashimoto.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Could you please let me

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: …know the reason for your visit and any preferred date or time for the appointment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, because my sore throat is not in bad condition, and I have cough and phlegm as well.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I’m sorry to hear that. Let’s find a suitable time for you. Do you have a preferred day or time for the appointment?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is anyone available tomorrow morning?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Let me check our schedule for tomorrow morning. One moment, please.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, we have an opening at 10 a.m. tomorrow. Does that work for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, perfect. Thank you so much. Could you please book that for me?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I’ll book that for you. You’re scheduled for tomorrow at 10 a.m. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do I need to have something to see a doctor?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, please bring your ID and your insurance card, if you have one. Also, any relevant medical records would be helpful. Let us know if you have any other questions.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, I understand.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great! We’ll see you tomorrow at 10 a.m. If you need anything else, just let us know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'm so sorry. I have misunderstood. So, could I take... Could I go to...”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sir, could I make an appointment at 11.30?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, let me check availability for  a.m. tomorrow. One moment, please.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I'm sorry. Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all! I’ll confirm that for you right away.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thanks.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! If you need anything else, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, could I, could I book at 11.30 a.m. tomorrow?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I’ll schedule you for  a.m. tomorrow. All set! Let me know if there's anything else you need.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you very much.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “OK.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right, have a great day, and we’ll see you tomorrow.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'm sorry, I would like to confirm one thing. How long would the appointment take?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Typically, the appointment will take about 30 minutes. If you need more time, just let us know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Great. Thank you for your help. See you tomorrow at 11.30 a.m.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! We’ll see you tomorrow at  a.m. Have a great day! Task 2: Visiting a Bank and Asking for Help with Banking Services Scenario

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: You are visiting a local bank branch or calling customer service to request help with everyday banking services. You may need to open a new account, update your details, or ask about specific features such as online banking or international transfers. Practise speaking clearly and politely in a formal setting. You will need to define the chatbot’s role as a bank staff or customer service officer. You can choose situations from the examples below; start with a simple request and try a more detailed interaction by asking about documents, account features, or banking procedures.

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course. I’ll take the role of a bank customer service officer. Hello, welcome to Maple Bank. How can I help you today? Are you looking to open a new account, update your details, or ask about a specific service?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, I'd like to open my new saving account.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! I'd be happy to assist you with that. May I start by confirming your identification details? Do you have a valid ID with you right now?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, I have Penang passport.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, that works well. We’ll also need your proof of address. Could you provide a recent utility bill or a bank statement?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I'm sorry.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all. Whenever you're ready, just let me know. Is there anything else I can help you with in the meantime?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sorry, I couldn't understand your opinion, previous one, so could you tell me again?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, no problem. I was just mentioning that we’ll need a proof of address, like a recent utility bill or bank statement, along with your passport. Let me know if you have those documents ready.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “okay so i'm not actually i'm an international student so i'm not student so i'd like i'm working i come i came here for working holiday so is it okay to bring only passport”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, that makes sense. Yes, your passport will definitely work as your ID. For proof of address, we can also consider a rental agreement or a letter from your employer if you have one. Let me know what you can provide.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “This is the only passport I can provide.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s perfectly fine. We can proceed with your passport for identification. We may just need to verify your address in another way. Let me know if you have any questions or if you need help with the next steps.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I also start up online banking today?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can set that up for you today as well. I’ll guide you through the process. Do you have a valid email address that we can use to register your online banking?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you. So, do I need to make an appointment, or can I walk in?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re welcome! You can absolutely walk in, but if you prefer, you can also make an appointment to ensure faster service. Whatever works best for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, could you have an appointment?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, I can help you schedule that. Could you let me know what date and time would be most convenient for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is it available to come this afternoon?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Let me check that for you. We do have availability this afternoon. What time would you prefer, around 2 PM or maybe a bit later?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “2 p.m. is fine.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great, I’ll schedule you for 2 PM this afternoon. If you need any further assistance before your appointment, just let me know. Looking forward to seeing you then!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you, and do I need to something to do before I go, I come?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re welcome! Just make sure to bring your passport and any proof of address you have, and we’ll handle the rest. If you have any questions before then, feel free to reach out.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! Have a great day, and we’ll see you this afternoon. Top of Form
